method.name: startWorker
method.comment: Start the BackgroundWorker Example: Dim bw as BackWorker bw.Initialise("YourClassName") bw.startWorker Note: in debug it will run on the main thread..

method.name: Initialise
method.comment: className: Name of the Class you want to execute on the background Note: if you're creating a non-ui app you should call StartMessageLoop in the class
